description: Unique identifier for this work order/asset procedure task record.
Foreign key referencing the parent work order/asset procedure this task belongs to.
Binary indicator that the task has been completed (1=yes, 0=no).
Likely references the task master/template used to create this procedure task; confirm with SME.
Flag indicating whether task details should be copied from the template/procedure when generating the work order; confirm with SME.
Indicator that this task is safety-related or safety-critical (1=yes, 0=no).
Estimated equipment downtime caused by this task, measured in hours.
Free-text instructions or descriptive details for performing the task.
Date/time the task was marked complete.
Order in which this task should be performed within the procedure.
Free-text comments or notes about the task.
System timestamp of the most recent change to this task record.
Timestamp of the last user-initiated modification to this record; may differ from last_modified; confirm with SME.
Identifier of the user who created this task record.
Timestamp when this task record was created.
Identifier of the user who last modified this task record.
Timestamp when a user last modified this task record.
